author: ben
msg: Use stderr instead of creating a new FILE *, mainly to avoid bugs on some OSes,
but also because it is cleaner.

author: randy
msg: Initialize server_rec->error_log to STDERR_FILENO so we can safely
use the system log routines before the configured error logs are open.

author: randy
msg: Further setrlimit cleanup. Revert to existing HAVE_RESOURCE mechanism.
Added rlim_t type for FreeBSD, BSDI, SUNOS4 and NetBSD

author: ben
msg: Makes setrlimit stuff burn less memory, and also tidies it up some more.

author: ben
msg: Major rehash of setrlimit stuff, for two reasons, first, to make it compile,
and second, to remove much redundant code.
